toast({title:'Procesando pago',description:'Tu pedido está siendo procesado',status:'success',duration:3000,isClosable:true});};const removeItem=itemId=>{setCartItems(cartItems.filter(item=>item.id!==itemId));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{maxW:"container.lg",py:8,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Heading,{mb:6,children:"Carrito de Compras"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VStack,{spacing:4,align:"stretch",children:cartItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(HStack,{padding:4,borderWidth:1,borderRadius:"lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{src:item.image,alt:item.name,boxSize:"100px",objectFit:"cover"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(VStack,{align:"start",flex:1,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{fontWeight:"bold",children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Text,{children:["$",item.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Text,{children:["Cantidad: ",item.quantity]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{size:"sm",colorScheme:"red",onClick:()=>removeItem(item.id),children:"Eliminar"})]},item.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Divider,{my:6}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(HStack,{justify:"space-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{fontSize:"xl",fontWeight:"bold",children:"Total:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Text,{fontSize:"xl",fontWeight:"bold",children:["$",total.toFixed(2)]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{colorScheme:"blue",size:"lg",width:"full",mt:4,onClick:handleCheckout,children:"Proceder al Pago"})]})]});};
